title: National Capital Parks-East: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations                         Groundwork Anacostia River at Shenandoah National Park The Green Team is one of Groundwork USA's signature programs. The Green Team participants from Groundwork Anacostia, Washington D.C., took part in a five day camping trip to Shenandoah National Park, receiving instruction in environmental restoration, GPS technology and exotic plant management. The trip helped foster environmental stewardship through service learning and an increased appreciation for the mission of the National Park Service.  Duration:3 minutes, 15 seconds
